reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made, soft, and comfortable, noting it's not itchy at all and fits great.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Gift or Wardrobe Addition for Women!
items.body: I bought this EVALESS cardigan for my wife, and she absolutely loves it. The knit is soft, lightweight, and breathable, with just enough stretch for comfort. The V-neck, open front, and bow tie design give it a cute, stylish look. She’s worn it with jeans, dresses, and leggings, and it works perfectly for multiple seasons. The quality is excellent, and it washes well without shrinking. A versatile, fashionable piece she wears all the time! Read more
items.author: Aleksey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this cardigan!
items.body: The knit is soft and cozy without being too heavy, and the bow tie detail gives it such a cute, stylish look. Perfect for layering in the fall. It fits great and feels really well-made. Read more
items.author: sandra cruz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value & everyday favorite
items.body: I bought this EVALESS cardigan and it exceeded my expectations. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, the sleeves are the right length, and the style is simple but polished. It works for casual days and even a bit dressy when I layer it with a nice top. The button-down front is practical and it holds up well after washing. I’m really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend it. Read more
items.author: Yarilut Reyes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous…!!!!
items.body: Love this sweater.Nice and cozy! This is a lovely cardigan with unique closing. Very soft and stylish. I get compliments whenever I wear it. Read more
items.author: flor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thicker than it looks in the pic but it's pretty and goes with lots of stuff
items.body: The quality of this sweater is great and it's soft and roomy. I love the tie - adds a bit of interest others sweaters lack. I wish it had pockets but I can't hold that against the sweater itself. My biggest problem is that the sweater is a bit thicker than I like. I like a sort of thin cardigan and this is warmer than I normally prefer. And because of the heft/weight, it feels a bit boxy. However I got the dark blue sweater and it really does look nice with so many types of skirts, pants, whatever. I wear it every week and think it's a nice add to my wardrobe for the fall/winter. Read more
items.author: A. Nielsen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight
items.body: I was so excited for this cardigan to arrive, and it’s even more beautiful in person! The sleeve and front details make it look so elegant, and the fabric is soft, warm, and not itchy at all. I got it in size S, and I’m absolutely in love with my purchase Read more
items.author: William Dearing

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but arrived with a huge hole!
items.body: Sweeter was cute, it was big so I would size down. I returned it and gave one ⭐️ because it had a huge hole on the shoulder. Read more
items.author: Mom of 3

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to the photo!
items.body: This is really cute and looks exactly like the photo. For me its a little long on the arms and more of a loose/comfort cardigan vs. something I could dress up. It washes well, is a good quality, and decently warm. I love this for cozy outfits. Read more
items.author: Mia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Four Leaf Clover, Parchment, Beige, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
